comments:
Build ID: M20070212-1330

Steps To Reproduce:
1.  Enable Automatic Checking of updates.
2. Select the BIRT updates.
3. Attempt to Install or "Install All" of the BIRT updates.



More information:
Greetings: 

Here is the trace from the log file. 

!ENTRY org.eclipse.update.core 4 0 2007-05-14 09:51:04.738
!MESSAGE Unable to complete action for feature "Mozilla Rhino Feature" due to errors.
!STACK 1
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException: Verification of feature unsuccessful. Installation cancelled. [java.lang.NullPointerException]

Let me know if you need anything else.
Thanks.

There was a bug https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=163421 fixed in M6 that would cause update site jars(.gz files) install failure. This only happens when you using JDK1.4, since .gz files are only supported by JDK1.5.

Please switch to use Eclipse platform M6 to try again. 

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 183601 ***

traces.message: Verification of feature unsuccessful. Installation cancelled. [java.lang.NullPointerException]
